title: Exploring the Faith of America's Presidents
description: Exploring the Faith of America's Presidents is an engaging, enlightening and inspirational resource which examines the role faith has played in the presidency throughout American history--and much more!"It's refreshing to read a perspective on the foundations of our country that's not driven by partisan political parties. This book quotes ALL Presidents, BOTH Republican and Democrat. It tackles head on the mistakes and the triumphs of our flawed American history." ~ Rev. Rufus Smith, Sr. Assoc. Pastor, Hope Presbyterian Church, Cordova, TN.
author: Kendra Hazlett Armstrong
